# octopusdeploy_tenant (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
data "octopusdeploy_tenant" "petclinic" {
  name = "Abu Dhabi Vet"
}

data "octopusdeploy_tenant" "octopus_deploy" {
  id = "Tenants-616"
}
```
